definition[0]: the average length of time that someone will live or that something will continue to work
example[0]: Men have a shorter lifespan than women.
example[1]: A TV set has an average lifespan of 11 years.
note[0]: a lifespan of 5 days/10 years etc
definition[1]: the period of time during which something will continue to be useful
example[2]: The new water distribution system could save hundreds of millions of pounds over its 150-yearlifespan.
